about.title: About Meeshy
about.subtitle: We believe that language barriers should never stand in the way of meaningful connections.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Connect the world, one translation at a time. Our platform empowers people from all corners of the globe to communicate freely, breaking down the walls that separate us and building bridges of understanding.

globalAccess.title: Global Accessibility
globalAccess.description: Making multilingual communication accessible to everyone, everywhere in the world.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Using the latest AI technologies for accurate and fast translations.

privacy.title: Privacy Respect
privacy.description: Your conversations remain private and secure with server-side translation powered by advanced AI models.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Made with ❤️ by developers who believe communication should have no boundaries.
team.details: Meeshy is developed by a passionate team of developers, linguists and designers who share a common vision: a world where language is no longer an obstacle to human communication.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: We are located in the heart of La Défense, Paris

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: We are available 24/7 to support you

train.title: By Train
train.rer: RER A: "La Défense - Grande Arche" station
train.time: From Paris: 10-15 minutes from Châtelet-Les Halles

car.title: By Car
car.parking: Parking: Several parking lots available in the area

partners.title: Partners
partners.subtitle: Join our partner ecosystem and help connect the world through breaking language barriers.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Teams
enterprise.description: Deploy Meeshy in your company to enable seamless multilingual communication across global teams.

education.title: Educational Institutions
education.description: Enable international collaboration in schools and universities with multilingual communication tools.

become.title: Become a Partner
become.description: Ready to transform communication in your organization? Contact us to discuss a customized partnership.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
